channel.title: Can anyone give me a 317 client
channel.description:
where i can set the java directory manually in the run.bat?
im getting sick of people not answering my topics so i geuss ill just try asking it this way

item.title: Can anyone give me a 317 client
item.dc:creator: @x_pk3r_xx x pk3r xx
item.description:
@x_pk3r_xx wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:4, topic:337332”][quote author=x pk3r xx link=topic=433736.msg3185275#msg3185275 date=1271671981]
i dont need to compile, i just want to run a client. the batch file i use to run it right now doesnt work because it finds java itself, and its not able to find my java. thats why i just need a file where i can run it with where i can put the java directory in myself.
[/quote]

Thanks alot.

When I play my server with the downloaded silab client it automatically closes after about 15 sec, anyone knows why?

@echo off
"your java version here" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar EGUI
pause

example for me it would be

“your java version here” == “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java.exe”

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar EGUI pause [/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Can anyone give me a 317 client

item.title: Can anyone give me a 317 client
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

x pk3r xx:

i dont need to compile, i just want to run a client. the batch file i use to run it right now doesnt work because it finds java itself, and its not able to find my java. thats why i just need a file where i can run it with where i can put the java directory in myself.

@echo off
"your java version here" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar EGUI
pause

example for me it would be

“your java version here” == “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java.exe”

@echo off
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar EGUI
pause

Read full topic
item.source: Can anyone give me a 317 client

item.title: Can anyone give me a 317 client
item.dc:creator: @x_pk3r_xx x pk3r xx
item.description:
@x_pk3r_xx wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:2, topic:337332”]Compiler Code

@echo off
title Compiler
echo Compiling...
"C:\Program File\Jdk.........\bin\javac.exe" *.java
echo Finished
pause

“C:\Program File\Jdk…\bin\javac.exe”
That is how you manually change the directory for Java.[/quote]

i dont need to compile, i just want to run a client. the batch file i use to run it right now doesnt work because it finds java itself, and its not able to find my java. thats why i just need a file where i can run it with where i can put the java directory in myself.

Read full topic
item.source: Can anyone give me a 317 client

item.title: Can anyone give me a 317 client
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Compiler Code

@echo off
title Compiler
echo Compiling...
"C:\Program File\Jdk.........\bin\javac.exe" *.java
echo Finished
pause

“C:\Program File\Jdk…\bin\javac.exe”
That is how you manually change the directory for Java.

Read full topic
